field.name: description
field.value:
AspViewBase.N() uses DictHelper to create an instance of MonoRailDictionary that holds parameters passed to a view component. MonoRailDictionary expects all values to be non-null and invokes ToString() on all values that are not strings. This is not suitable for AspView where null values and non-string values need to be passed to view components.
The attached patch contains a test case for the AspView test website and introduces a ParametersDIctionary with semantics similar to MonoRailDictionary except that it accepts non-null, non-string values.
